title: Best of The Program | 6/16/21
description:
Pat Gray and Jeffy fill in. College students believe the American flag is racist, and Campus Reform caught it on video. Australia’s Sky News called out CNN’s extreme shift in tone while covering Biden’s G7 summit from how it covered the summit under President Trump. A pastor in Canada was arrested for hosting a service outside.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
